Name: Wendys
Description: Stop by for all of your Wendy's favourites including Baconators, chili and Frostys.

Name: Wahlburgers
Description: Burger restaurant and sports bar offering single, double and triple burgers.  At certain times of the day, this location may not be available.

Name: Wahlburgers
Description: Burger restaurant and sports bar offering single, double and triple burgers.  At certain times of the day, this location may not be available.

Name: Vinifera
Description: A Mediterranean-inspired menu of small dishes for sharing, sandwiches, salads and baked goods.

Name: Vinifera
Description: A Mediterranean-inspired menu of small dishes for sharing, sandwiches, salads and baked goods.

Name: Urban Market
Description: Take-away sandwiches and salads prepared daily, plus packaged snacks and drinks.

Name: Urban Crave
Description: Diverse and creative street food from around the globe. In the morning, Urban Crave also offers a menu of hearty breakfast dishes.

Name: Upper Crust
Description: Upper Crust offers a variety of freshly baked baguette sandwiches, salads, sweet treats, fruit and other travel-friendly snacks, including many vegetarian options.

Name: Twist by Roger Mooking
Description: Chef Roger Mooking has created a menu that is focused on comfort foods with a global Twist. Everything is prepared from scratch with the freshest ingredients.

Name: Tim Hortons
Description: Try this popular Canadian brewed coffee, made with 100% Arabica beans. At select locations Tim Hortons also serves quick meal options, like bagels, sandwiches and salads, plus snacks, sweet treats and hot and cold drinks.

Name: The Hearth by Lynn Crawford
Description: Fresh, seasonal menu from Toronto chef Lynn Crawford. Try the hearth-fired flatbreads, fresh salads, sandwiches and more.

Name: The Distillery Bar
Description: Check out a menu of pub-inspired burgers, sandwiches and light fare to eat in the Distillery Food Hall or take out.

Name: Thai Express
Description: Fresh, traditional Thai food with new-world flavours.

Name: Tap & Pour
Description: Beer and food available for everyone's tastes at this casual pub.

Name: Swiss Chalet
Description: Casual family restaurant serving rotisserie chicken, salads, pasta, sandwiches and kid-friendly dishes, like mini burgers, pizza and chicken strips.

Name: Subway
Description: Fast, fresh sandwiches and salads, made to order. Subway offers a variety of budget-friendly meals at the airport.

Name: Smoke's Poutinerie
Description: Creative variations on poutine, made with fresh, hand-cut fries, squeaky cheese curds and Smoke's signature gravy.

Name: Smoke's Burritorie
Description: Customized burritos made to order.

Name: SmashBurger
Description: A fast, casual burger restaurant delighting the taste buds of passengers with its signature cooking process.

Name: Shanghai 360
Description: Here you'll find authentic Chinese cuisine to take away.

Name: Rock Squeeze Whisky Bar
Description: Serving over 20 top international whiskies, including exclusive and rare labels, plus a menu of savoury or sweet light bites. Stop by for well poured drinks, good music, a comfortable setting and great service.

Name: Red Rocket
Description: Red Rocket serves all-day breakfast, burgers and classic dishes in their streetcar inspired environment. At certain times of the day, this location may not be available.

Name: Red Rocket
Description: Red Rocket serves all-day breakfast, burgers and classic dishes in their streetcar inspired environment. At certain times of the day, this location may not be available.

Name: Paramount Fine Foods
Description: Offering a menu of fresh, healthy, high-quality certified halal, Middle Eastern cuisine to grab-and-go or sit down and enjoy.

Name: Paramount Fine Foods
Description: Offering a menu of fresh, healthy, high-quality certified halal, Middle Eastern cuisine to grab-and-go or sit down and enjoy.

Name: Nobel Burger Bar
Description: Stop by to enjoy a delicious gourmet burger at this gate-side lounge.

Name: Mill Street Brewery Pub
Description: For a truly Toronto experience, stop by Mill Street Brewery, a Toronto-based craft brewery and the winner of national and international brewing awards.

Name: Marathi
Description: Stop by for some Indian street food and other delicacies, from a unique menu developed by Toronto chef Hemant Bhagwani.

Name: LEE Kitchen by Susur Lee
Description: Specialties include traditional dim sum, 'Top Chef' Green Curry Chicken and cheeseburger spring rolls.

Name: Landed Tap House
Description: Arrivals Bar featuring draught beer, bottle beers and local Ontario Wines. Light fare of salted pretzels, cheese and charcuterie trays.

Name: La Place
Description: Choose from a range of natural, fresh and homemade made-to-order sandwiches, flatbread pizza, baked goods, freshly squeezed juices and coffee drinks.

Name: Ice Bar
Description: A casual spot to enjoy cold draught beer and Middle Eastern food.

Name: Heirloom Bakery Cafe
Description: Light entrees and bakery items, made to order from local ingredients.

Name: Heirloom Bakery Cafe
Description: Baker and entrepreneur Devin Connell brings healthy, light entrees and delicious baked goods.

Name: Freshii
Description: Fresh, nutritious meal choices to energize passengers on the go.

Name: Freshii
Description: Fresh, nutritious meal choices to energize passengers on the go. At certain times of the day, this location may not be available.

Description: Fresh, nutritious meal choices to energize passengers on the go. At certain times of the day, this location may not be available.

Name: Fionn MacCools
Description: Traditional Irish pub with daily featured pint and menu of favourites, like fish and chips, shepherd's pie, burgers and wings.

Name: Fetta
Description: A lively panini bar with a delicious selection of paninis, salads and small plates.

Name: Farmers Market
Description: Here you'll find fresh, locally-produced snacks and a great selection of grab-and-go sandwiches, salads and treats.

Name: El Catrin Taqueria
Description: Stop by for authentic traditional and modern Mexican tacos and tortas from a menu inspired by one of Mexico City's top chefs.

Name: Corso Pizza and Pasta
Description: A lively trattoria offering rustic Italian flavours in fresh-made pastas, pizzas, salads and tasty antipasti.

Name: Cork and Well
Description: Relax with a cold beer or glass of wine in this cozy environment before you take off. At certain times of the day, this location may not be available.

Name: Cork and Well
Description: Relax with a cold beer or glass of wine in this cozy environment before you take off. At certain times of the day, this location may not be available.

Name: Cluny Grille
Description: Modern, casual and fun French-inspired food and pastries.

Name: Cibo Market
Description: Large selection of sandwiches, snacks and drinks. There's something for everyone, all packaged and ready for travel.

Name: Caplansky's Deli & Snack Bar
Description: Chef Zane Caplansky reinvents the deli and brings Jewish soul food to passengers.

Name: Camden Food Co.
Description: Providing healthy kid-friendly options, as well as gluten-free, organic or just great tasting snacks and meals.

Name: The Burger Federation
Description: World's famous flavours between two buns. Each burger is hand crafted by our chefs using only fresh ground meat and ingredients.

Name: BUILT Custom Burger
Description: Build a burger to suit your tastes. Choose from beef, chicken, turkey or veggie burgers, then add your favourite toppings to a bun or bowl of greens.

Name: Booster Juice
Description: Enjoy signature premium smoothies, as well as fresh-squeezed juices, hot food and grab-and-go snacks.

Name: Boccone Trattoria by Massimo Capra
Description: Chef Massimo Capra's dine-in or grab-and-go menu offers fresh, rustic Italian cuisine including antipasti, salads and soups, pizzas, sandwiches, pastas, mains and desserts.

Name: Boccone Pronto
Description: A grab-and-go location operated by Chef Massimo Capra, check out the fine Italian fare and grab a freshly brewed coffee before boarding.

Name: Bento Sushi
Description: Fresh take-out sushi and hot Japanese entrees, made to order.

Name: BEERHIVE
Description: A wide selection of local and international draughts to pair with a delicious menu of contemporary and classic options.

Name: BEERHIVE
Description: A wide selection of local and international draughts to pair with a delicious menu of contemporary and classic options.

Name: Bar 120: Cuisine Transformed
Description: The first molecular cuisine restaurant in a North American airport with a menu developed by Toronto's renowned modernist Chef John Placko

Name: Bahn Shop
Description: Enjoy fresh, healthy Saigon street food, like hot or cold noodles, summer rolls, soup and sandwiches.

Name: Archeo Focacceria
Description: Enjoy fresh Italian-inspired flatbreads with classic pairings.

Name: Apropos
Description: Pair craft beer or local and international wines with small plates and unique sandwiches.

Name: Apropos
Description: Pair craft beer or local and international wines with small plates and unique sandwiches.

Name: Acer
Description: Modern Japanese menu offering fresh, healthy dishes like sushi, dumplings, noodles and curry.

Name: A&W
Description: Fast-food burgers,chicken and fries, plus the classic root beer and ice cream floats in frosted mugs.

Name: David's Tea
Description: Offering a selection of more than 150 tea varieties and several never-before-seen flavours that can be served on-the-go, hot or iced, and purchased by the gram.

Description: Offering a selection of more than 150 tea varieties and several never-before-seen flavours that can be served on-the-go, hot or iced, and purchased by the gram.
